name: tsor2
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wo(wn(w1), wo(w1, w2)))
-| wo(wn(w1), wo(w1, w2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wo(wn(w1), wo(w1, w2)))
-| wo(wn(w1), wo(w1, w2))

body.origin:
|- wo(wn(w1), wo(w1, w2))
-| wi(w1, wo(w1, w2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wo(wn(w1), wo(w1, w2)))
-| wi(w1, wo(w1, w2))

comment: A Tseitin axiom for logical disjunction, in deduction form. (Contributed by Giovanni Mascellani, 25-Mar-2018.)
